column2: [103,18] kathaṃ punar etannitya-jñāne kramāder asphuraṇam iti, yāvatā kramākrama-kroṭīkṛtam eva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cetata eva bādhakāvatāraḥ, viparīta-rūpāvatāraṇaṃ vinā tasya vaiyarthyāt | so 'yaṃ nityātmani kramākramāropau bhavatas tad-bādhakopanyāsaṃ prayojayen nāma, na tu nitye kramākramāv antarbhāvayituṃ prabhavati, virodhāt | kālāntaraika-rūpatayā hi nityatvaṃ, kramākramau ca kṣaṇa-dvaye 'pi bhinna-rūpatayā, tato nityasya kramākramikārthakriyā-śakteś ca paraspara-pratyanīka-rūpatayā durnivāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye 'ntarbhavaḥ kramādeḥ? anantarbhāvāc ca śuddha-nitya-vikalpena dūrīkṛta-samāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ kramākramasya? sarvasya ca vikalpa-mātra-gocararasya vikalpārūḍharūpāpekṣayā viruddha-niyatāniyata-dharma-vyavasthānaṃ, yathā triguṇyasyaikatvaṃ viruddhaṃ dharmaḥ prasāda-tāpa-dainya-kriyā niyatā, nairātmyetara-yogo 'niyataḥ, tathehāpi pūrvāpara-kālayor ekātmatayā yady akārakam akārakameva, sarvadā kārakatve ca kārakatvam eva nityaṃ, kramākramau tu kadācit kriyā-śakti-svabhāvau, yaugapadye hi vyaktam ekadaiva karaṇam iti kādācitka-kriyatvam, krame 'pi kṛtāyāḥ kariṣyamāṇāyāś ca karaṇāt kādācitky eva kriyā, sahakāry-apekṣāyāḥ kṣiptatvāt | tataḥ kādācitkākādācitka-kriyatvayoḥ paraspara-parihāra-sthitalakṣaṇatayā virodhaḥ siddhaḥ | evaṃ sati pratiyogini nitye vikalpyamāne eka-jñāna-saṃsargilakṣaṇa-prāpte viruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasya tadupalabdhir evānupalabdhiḥ | saiva vārthakriyāśakter vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ | tasmād vyāpakadharmyupalabdhitayā na vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya viśeṣaḥ | yadica dharmitve 'pi vastv-avastutayā vibhāgo bhāgya-hīnasaya bhavato matimadyāpi duḥsthayati, vastuny api dharmiṇi ekatra pradeśaḥ kaṭhino dharī drava-rūpam anyatra jalamitādayo vibhāgā bhaṅgavantas tad-anviṣyantaḥ kena vāraṇīyāḥ? tasmād vastv-avastutayāpi bheda-cintā kopayoginī?

column2: [104,16] kiṃ tāvat paramparayāpi vastunaḥ sakāśād āgatatvam eva vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvam tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca vyāpti-grahaṇa-gocara-vastu-pratibaddhatvam asyāpi na kṣīṇam, dharmi-vikalpa-vastu-pratibaddhatvaṃ vā | atha vastuni kenacid rūpeṇa vyavahāra-kāraṇatvaṃ vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvam? tad api kṣaṇabhaṅgi-vastu-sādhanopāyatvena pratiṣṭhitam asya, tasyaiva vā dharmi-vikalpasya vastuno 'vastūpādānatva-vyavahāra-kāraṇatvena dharmi-vastunaiva tu vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvam iti kim anena? yadi caiṣa gṛhaṇa eva tat kim anumāna eva vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ vā? na pratyakṣe, loṅgāśrayaṇam eva hi dharmi-cintām avakāśayati | tad-anāśrayaṃ tu pratyakṣaṃ vastuna āgataṃ vastu-nimitta-vyavahārakam ity eva vastu-adhiṣṭhānam, evam anumānam api tathaiva vastv-adhiṣṭhānam iti gṛhyatām | kevalaṃ pramparayā pratyakṣasyāpi hi janmaiva sākṣāt, vyavaharaṇaṃ tu vialpādi-vyavadhānenaiva | anumānasya punar ubhayam api paramparayā | vyavahāraṇam api smṛty-abhilāṣādinā vyavadhānāt | evaṃ vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvam anumāne vyavadhānena dūṣaṇam eva | kevalam anumāne 'py anyatra sādhya-dharmāpekṣayā yad vyavadhānaṃ tato 'tiriktam idaṃ vyāpti-grahaṇāpekṣaṃ varata iti dhāndhyaṃ dhiyaḥ | tatrāpi na sarvo 'numānāntara-sādhāraṇo 'yaṃ dharmaḥ | sva-sādhye hi sākṣāt pratibandham avadhūya viparyaya-vyāptyā gamakatvaṃ kārya-kāraṇa-vyapakānupalabdhiṣu |

column2: [105,7] tadvad vastv-adhiṣṭhānatvam api yadi yathokta-vyavadhānena viṣaya-viśeṣe bhavet kīdṛśo doṣaḥ, kasyacid bādhakasyābhāvāt? dharmi-vikalpāpekṣayā tu na tāvato 'pi vyavadhānasya saṃbhavaḥ, (43a) asādhāraṇī ca pratyāsatti-dharmiṇo vikalpākāreṇa sahaikīkaraṇāt | nirākārapakṣe 'pi hi vikalpāyattaprakāśatvād alīkanityākārasya dharmiṇaḥ | tasmād dharmiṇo vastvadhiṣṭhānaparyeṣaṇaṃ pratyāsatti-viśeṣāśrayatayā vikalpa-vapuṣāpi kṛtārthībhaved iti na doṣaḥ kaścit | ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvāt, na kharaṃ kharaśṛṅgaṃ dravyatāviyogād ityādau yojyaḥ, nāvastuni virodhaḥ pratīty-aviṣayatvād ityādau ca śaraṇam |

column2: [105,15] yadi pratīti-mātrāpekṣayā pratīty-aviṣayatvaṃ tadā asiddhiḥ anubhavāpekṣayānekāntaḥ | ity evaṃ prakāra-dūṣaṇa-parihāra-śaktiḥ, na punar āśrayāsiddhyādi-dūṣaṇa-gaṇa-gaṇanā kācit | etena vyāpakānupalabdhau hi vyāpyābhāvo 'nyaḥ pratipattavya iti helayāpahastitam, dharmi-rūpasya bhinnasya pratipatti-viṣayasya pratipādāt, gaṇṭśale vṛkṣatvābhāvena śiṃśapātvābhāvavat | tad evaṃ na prakṛta-vyāpakānupalambhasya svarūpāsiddhiḥ, nitya-krama-yaugapadyayoḥ virodha-pratipādanāt | yad āha, kramākrama-virodha iti, tad vyāpaka-dvāreṇa punar arthakriyā-virodhād ity āha | nāpy āśrayāsiddhir avastuno 'pi dharmitva-pratipādanāt, vikalpena pratipatti-pratipādanāc ca | ata eva śāstre,

column2: [106] evaṃ dṛṣṭānta-dharmiṇo 'pi asiddhi-parihāraḥ | vyāpyavyāpakābhāvau ca siddhāv eva, nityavat tatra vimater abhāvāt | tataḥ sapakṣe sattva-niṣedho 'pi dhvastaḥ | atha mañjānekānta-krāntiḥ kṛteti, tad anena siddha-sādhya-pratibandhāt sattva-hetoḥ siddhaḥ sādhya-dharmiṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgāṅgīkāra iti ||
